docs.title: Welcome to Mafia.gg API
docs.text: You are looking at the documentation page of mafia.gg an online social deduction game

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
Inorder to get the most out of this documentation I expect you to have at a working knowledge in

  • A programming language of your choice
  • Websockets

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: The game communicates by two different protocoles, the HTTP and websockets. Most of the gameplay and chat happens through websockets while steps like authentication and room modifications happen over HTTP.

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
User authentication is done as POST request. We can simulate one in order to get the cookies. They can then be used to authenticate our requests.

Make a POST request to https://mafia.gg/api/user-session with your login credentials

{
    "login": "Mafia.gg Username",
    "password": "Mafia.gg password"
}

Save the cookies included with this response
